projectMap

Class WifiList

  • java.lang.Object
    • projectMap.WifiList

  • public class WifiList
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Tom This class represents a list of wifis, "held" as Wifi objects in an ArrayList.

      • filterRange

        public void filterRange(double lon,
                        double lat,
                        double alt,
                        int range)
        Filters out wifis that are not in range from given point.
        Parameters:
        wifis - - List of wifi's to filter out from.
        lat - - Lat of anchor/point.
        lon - - Lon of anchor/point.
        alt - - Alt of anchor/point.
        range - - range in meters of maximum distance to count in the wifis.

      • filterRange

        public void filterRange(javax.vecmath.Point3d point,
                        int range)
        Overloads filterRange() function to be used with a 'Point3d' object instead of specified lat/lon/alt values.
        Parameters:
        wifis - - List of wifi's to filter out from.
        point - - Point3d object representing current location to measure from.
        range - - range in meters of maximum distance to count in the wifis.

      • filterSignal

        public void filterSignal(double signalLow)
        Overloads filterSignal() function for use just with a "lower" bound.
        Parameters:
        wifis - - List of all wifis.
        signalLow - - Minimum signal requested to be on list.

      • filterSignal

        public void filterSignal(double signalLow,
                         double signalHigh)

        Parameters:
        wifis - - List of all wifis.
        signalLow - - Minimum signal requested to be on list.
        signalHigh - - Maximum signal requested to be on list.
